introduction.section1: Phnom Penh is the capital of Cambodia, a modern city with many cultural monuments.
introduction.section2: Its sumptuous and shining royal palace will dazzle you with its golden roof. Discover the sublime national museum and the overwhelming history of Cambodia with its former prison from the Khmer Rouge regime, which will make you discover the country differently.
introduction.section3: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

title: Phnom Penh
meta-description: Discover Phnom Penh, its royal palace, its art museum, a modern city full of cultural monuments but also the genocide museum which will teach you the history of Cambodia. For each place, we try to transcribe our visit as best as possible by telling you: Where to go? How to get there? Why? When? How long and at what period?
social-network-description: Phnom Penh is modern city with many cultural monuments. Its sumptuous royal palace, its sublime national museum, and so many more. Besides, discover the overwhelming history of Cambodia with its former prison from the Khmer Rouge regime.
